issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.

Must be one or more of: DisplayManager.VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_PUBLIC, DisplayManager.VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_PRESENTATION, DisplayManager.VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_SECURE, DisplayManager.VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_OWN_CONTENT_ONLY, DisplayManager.VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_AUTO_MIRROR
issue.errorLine1: return displayManager.createVirtualDisplay("easycontrol", realDisplayinfo.width, realDisplayinfo.height, realDisplayinfo.density, surface, flags);
